data.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - Znamensk-Svir
data.detailed_description:
Znamensk-Svir: A fictional route, built on the motives of the North-West of Russia. The Znamensk-Svir section is a two-track electrified section of alternating current with a length of 70 kilometers. The fleet of rolling stock is represented by: passenger electric locomotives: ChS8, ChS4T, EP1M; freight electric locomotives: 2ES5K, 3ES5K, VL80; electric trains: ED9M and ER9. Despite the fact that the route is fully electrified there is a diesel locomotive represented by locomotives of the 2TE116, 2TE10M and 2TE25A series.

Passenger train No. 162A: In this scenario, you will take control of the passenger train No. 162A, following the route Znamensk-Svir, led by the main electric locomotive ChS8-036. During the passage of the scenario, you will encounter intense traffic of both oncoming and passing trains. Approximate time for the session is 1 hour.

data.short_description: Znamensk-Svir: A fictional route, built on the motives of the North-West of Russia. The Znamensk-Svir section is a two-track electrified section of alternating current with a length of 70 kilometers.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, French, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
